function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fragmented management in public health emergency systems","Impact":"Ineffective response to pandemics and contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Adopting a new model of multidisciplinary knowledge sharing and cooperative action","Technologies":"Smart technologies, integrated command and control centers, urban observatories","People":"Urban authorities, stakeholders, public health professionals","Owner":"Urban authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of access to data for evidence-based decision making","Impact":"Inefficient and ineffective actions towards common goals","Mitigation":"Implementing a new model of multidisciplinary knowledge sharing to enable data accessibility","Technologies":"Data visualization and analytics capacities, smart technologies","People":"Urban authorities, stakeholders, public health professionals","Owner":"Urban authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Failure to identify and understand social and environmental risks compounded by pandemics","Impact":"Complicated risk factors related to access to food, hygiene, and healthcare","Mitigation":"Utilizing integrated impact assessment to design and implement suitable policy interventions","Technologies":"Data visualization and analytics capacities, smart technologies","People":"Urban authorities, public health professionals, policymakers","Owner":"Urban authorities, public health organizations"}]}
